attributes.action: Remove Sadiq Khan from the Office Of Mayor of London.
attributes.background: Since he started hes tenure the level crime has increased sufficiently to discourage Londoners from going about their daily lives without fear of becoming a victim.Added to that in my life travelling to many capital cities  I believe London to be the dirtiest.On his watch again.He needs to go .

rejection.details: The Mayor of London is elected by the people of London, not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
